questions.quote: Nice going. Thank you, that ought to get us a free dessert..  I think the busboy's in trouble.
You know, I don't even know why you're fooling around with this ring. I've been telling you, get yourself some plugs. Or a piece.
There are plenty of things you can do, there's chess and uh uh mah jong,
Vivian left me a message. I guess a certain someone changed her mind about whether someone was responsible enough to watch certain other someone.
Let me ask you something, George. You having any personal problems at home? Girl trouble, love trouble of any kind?
Oh, no no no, I'm fine. Let me help you with these dishes, huh?
Ah, excuse me. When your, uh, when your wallet was open, I - I glanced inside, and I couldn't help but notice that you have several crisp dollar bills.
Kramer says you need it because you're an entertainer and you're desperate for attention.
I can't. She'll get upset. I never talk about other women with her, especially this one tonight.
Yeah. Well, let's hope this evening turns out a little better.
